definitions.title: n.f.pl.
definitions.body: Ges (in Thes) exitialia, fatal things (√ [[תלף]] = Ar. talifa perish);—poet for weapons; many other conj. in Comm.: ´[[כְּ מגְדַּל דָּוִיד חַוָּאדֵךְ בָּנוּי לְת]]: Ct So 4:4 a, doubtful; Che:Expos. Times, ix. 423: JQ, July 1899, 562 [[שְׁלָטִים]] shields, cf. v:b.
